title: The Future of JavaScript Frameworks
description: A deep dive into the latest trends in JavaScript frameworks, comparing the pros and cons of React, Vue, and Svelte.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
description: Learn how to design and build robust and scalable APIs using Node.js and Express, with a focus on performance and security.

title: Mastering CSS Grid and Flexbox
description: A hands-on workshop to master the modern CSS layout techniques of Grid and Flexbox for creating complex and responsive web designs.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: An introductory session on the fundamentals of Machine Learning using Python, covering popular libraries like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

title: DevOps for Dummies: CI/CD Pipelines Explained
description: A beginner-friendly guide to understanding and implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines for your projects.

title: The Art of Debugging
description: Learn effective strategies and tools for debugging code across different languages and platforms, turning frustration into a solvable puzzle.
